description: Quality check criteria per content type for the Quality Management Agent

general.description: Default quality checks for any content

checks.name: grammar_spelling
checks.description: No grammar or spelling errors

checks.name: brand_voice
checks.description: Aligns with Werkpilot brand voice: professional, approachable, data-driven

checks.name: clarity
checks.description: Clear, concise, and easy to understand

checks.name: factual_accuracy
checks.description: All claims are accurate and verifiable

checks.name: completeness
checks.description: Content covers all necessary points

blog_post.description: Quality checks for blog posts and articles

checks.name: grammar_spelling
checks.description: No grammar or spelling errors in body text, headings, and meta

checks.name: brand_voice
checks.description: Professional yet approachable tone, Swiss quality standards

checks.name: seo_optimization
checks.description: Keyword density 1-2%, meta description under 155 chars, proper heading hierarchy

checks.name: readability
checks.description: Flesch-Kincaid grade level 8-12, short paragraphs, bullet points where appropriate

checks.name: factual_accuracy
checks.description: All statistics, claims, and references are verifiable

checks.name: structure
checks.description: Proper intro/body/conclusion, clear headings, logical flow

checks.name: cta_present
checks.description: Contains a clear call-to-action relevant to the topic

checks.name: content_length
checks.description: Minimum 600 words for standard posts, 1200 for pillar content

checks.name: grammar_spelling
checks.description: Zero tolerance for errors in email communications

checks.name: subject_line
checks.description: Compelling, under 50 chars, no spam trigger words

checks.name: personalization
checks.description: Uses recipient name, company, and relevant context

checks.name: cta_clarity
checks.description: Clear, single call-to-action per email

checks.name: tone
checks.description: Professional, respectful, appropriately formal/informal for context

checks.name: spam_risk
checks.description: No spam trigger words (FREE, URGENT, etc.), proper formatting

checks.name: length
checks.description: Concise - under 200 words for cold outreach, under 400 for newsletters

social_media.description: Quality checks for social media posts

checks.name: grammar_spelling
checks.description: No errors in post text

checks.name: brand_voice
checks.description: Matches platform tone (LinkedIn: professional, Twitter: concise and engaging)

checks.name: engagement_potential
checks.description: Includes hook, question, or call-to-action to drive engagement

checks.name: hashtag_usage
checks.description: Relevant hashtags, appropriate count (LinkedIn: 3-5, Twitter: 1-3)

checks.name: length_compliance
checks.description: Within platform character limits, optimized for readability

report.description: Quality checks for internal and client reports

checks.name: data_accuracy
checks.description: All numbers, percentages, and trends are mathematically correct

checks.name: grammar_spelling
checks.description: No errors in professional reports

checks.name: completeness
checks.description: All required sections present, no missing data points

checks.name: actionability
checks.description: Includes clear recommendations and next steps

checks.name: data_freshness
checks.description: Uses the most recent available data

checks.name: visualization_clarity
checks.description: Charts and tables are clear, labeled, and support the narrative

checks.name: executive_summary
checks.description: Concise executive summary present at the top

checks.name: grammar_spelling
checks.description: Zero tolerance for errors in client-facing proposals

checks.name: personalization
checks.description: Tailored to specific client needs, industry, and pain points

checks.name: value_proposition
checks.description: Clear ROI and value proposition with supporting evidence

checks.name: pricing_clarity
checks.description: Transparent pricing with clear deliverables per tier

checks.name: professional_formatting
checks.description: Consistent formatting, branding, and visual hierarchy

checks.name: case_study_relevance
checks.description: Includes relevant case studies or social proof

checks.name: timeline_realism
checks.description: Proposed timeline is realistic and achievable

checks.name: keyword_optimization
checks.description: Primary keyword in title, H1, first 100 words, meta description. Density 1-2%

checks.name: meta_description
checks.description: Under 155 characters, includes keyword, compelling click-through

checks.name: heading_structure
checks.description: Proper H1 > H2 > H3 hierarchy, keywords in subheadings

checks.name: internal_links
checks.description: 2-5 relevant internal links per 1000 words

checks.name: readability
checks.description: Short paragraphs, bullet points, scannable format

checks.name: content_depth
checks.description: Comprehensive coverage of topic, better than top-ranking competitors

checks.name: grammar_spelling
checks.description: No errors that could harm credibility

checks.name: image_alt_text
checks.description: All images have descriptive alt text with keywords where natural

checks.name: accuracy
checks.description: Meaning fully preserved from source language

checks.name: fluency
checks.description: Natural-sounding in target language, no literal translations

checks.name: terminology
checks.description: Correct industry and domain-specific terminology

checks.name: cultural_adaptation
checks.description: Appropriate for target market (Swiss German vs German German, etc.)

checks.name: formatting_preserved
checks.description: Original formatting, links, and structure maintained
